subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alexander Vinokourov, 33, Kazakh, Astana, above — The favorite, if only because no one else seems to be. His previous best Tour finish, third in 2003, came largely because of his unpredictable style of attacking. This year, however, everyone will be watching him.
